DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical trial is to determine whether S(+)-ibuprofen affect the platelet inhibition under steady state acetylsalicylic acid conditions.
DOC.brief_title: S(+)-Ibuprofen Effects on Asprin Treated Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy caucasian volunteer Must be able to swallow tablets Underlying diseases Ulcus pepticum in history Abuse of alcoholic beverages (40g/d) Hypersensitivity to investigational medicinal products
